internal.content: --- title: "rule" --- report-toolkit API @report-toolkit/inspector rule Describes a Rule ## Type aliases ### RuleDefinition Ƭ **RuleDefinition**: *object* #### Type declaration: * **id**: *string* * **inspect**: *Function* * **meta**: *any* ## Functions ### createRule ▸ **createRule**(`ruleDefinition`: [RuleDefinition](report_toolkit_inspector.rule#ruledefinition)): *[Rule](../classes/report_toolkit_inspector.rule.rule)* Creates a `Rule` from a user-defined (or builtin) `RuleDefinition`, which is the exports of a rule definition file. **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `ruleDefinition` | [RuleDefinition](report_toolkit_inspector.rule#ruledefinition) | Rule definition | **Returns:** *[Rule](../classes/report_toolkit_inspector.rule.rule)* New rule
